description: Describe the previous term in binary (method A - initial term is 0).
comments: Method A = 'frequency' (in binary mode) followed by 'digit'-indication.
links: Kade Robertson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..17
example: E.g., the term after 11110 is obtained by saying "four (i.e., 100 in binary mode) 1, one 0", which gives 100110.
author: _Olivier de Mouzon_
extensions: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 06 2010
